description: Redesign navigation and action buttons to extreme minimalism - icons only, hairline weight, faded opacity. Quote and reflections become the undisputed focus.

userStories.title: Reduce navigation icons to whisper weight
acceptanceCriteria: Remove all text labels from navigation
userStories.notes: Navigation.tsx - transform from chunky icon+label to whisper icons only

userStories.title: Minimize navigation container chrome
acceptanceCriteria: Reduce vertical padding (py-2 -> py-1.5 or less)
Background more transparent or matching page
userStories.notes: The nav bar itself should barely register visually

userStories.title: Reduce action button icons to minimal presence
acceptanceCriteria: Remove all text labels (Save, Reflect, Share, Another)
Add aria-label and title for accessibility
userStories.notes: ActionButtons.tsx - icons become subtle marks not buttons

userStories.title: Handle 'remaining pulls' indicator subtly
acceptanceCriteria: Show remaining count as tiny superscript or badge
userStories.notes: The '3 left' text is too prominent, make it a whisper

userStories.title: Reduce action buttons container spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Reduce py-8 to py-4 or less
Actions feel like punctuation, not a toolbar
userStories.notes: Less vertical real estate consumed by actions

userStories.title: Add smooth hover transitions
acceptanceCriteria: All opacity changes have 200ms ease transition
userStories.notes: Interactions should feel gentle, not snappy
